lyrics.ChnStr: 走在风中 今天阳光 突然好温柔
lyrics.Pinyin: 走[zǒu]在[zài]风[fēng]中[zhōng] 今[jīn]天[tiān]阳[yáng]光[guāng] 突[tū]然[rán]好[hǎo]温[wēn]柔[róu]
lyrics.EngStr: Walking in the wind, today's sunlight suddenly feels so gentle

lyrics.ChnStr: 天的温柔 地的温柔 像你抱着我
lyrics.Pinyin: 天[tiān]的[de]温[wēn]柔[róu] 地[dì]的[de]温[wēn]柔[róu] 像[xiàng]你[nǐ]抱[bào]着[zháo]我[wǒ]
lyrics.EngStr: The gentleness of the sky and earth, like you embracing me

lyrics.ChnStr: 然后发现你的改变 孤单的今后
lyrics.Pinyin: 然[rán]后[hòu]发[fā]现[xiàn]你[nǐ]的[de]改[gǎi]变[biàn] 孤[gū]单[dān]的[de]今[jīn]后[hòu]
lyrics.EngStr: Then I discovered your change, the lonely days ahead

lyrics.ChnStr: 如果冷 该怎么度过
lyrics.Pinyin: 如[rú]果[guǒ]冷[lěng] 该[gāi]怎[zěn]么[mó]度[dù]过[guò]
lyrics.EngStr: If it's cold, how should I get through it

lyrics.ChnStr: 天边风光 身边的我 都不在你眼中
lyrics.Pinyin: 天[tiān]边[biān]风[fēng]光[guāng] 身[shēn]边[biān]的[de]我[wǒ] 都[dū]不[bù]在[zài]你[nǐ]眼[yǎn]中[zhōng]
lyrics.EngStr: The scenery at the horizon, and me by your side, are no longer in your eyes

lyrics.ChnStr: 你的眼中藏着什么 我从来都不懂
lyrics.Pinyin: 你[nǐ]的[de]眼[yǎn]中[zhōng]藏[cáng]着[zháo]什[shí]么[mó] 我[wǒ]从[cóng]来[lái]都[dū]不[bù]懂[dǒng]
lyrics.EngStr: What's hidden in your eyes, I've never understood

lyrics.ChnStr: 没有关系 你的世界 就让你拥有
lyrics.Pinyin: 没[méi]有[yǒu]关[guān]系[xì] 你[nǐ]的[de]世[shì]界[jiè] 就[jiù]让[ràng]你[nǐ]拥[yōng]有[yǒu]
lyrics.EngStr: It doesn't matter, let you have your world

lyrics.ChnStr: 不打扰 是我的温柔
lyrics.Pinyin: 不[bù]打[dǎ]扰[rǎo] 是[shì]我[wǒ]的[de]温[wēn]柔[róu]
lyrics.EngStr: Not disturbing you is my gentleness

lyrics.ChnStr: 不知道 不明了 不想要
lyrics.Pinyin: 不[bù]知[zhī]道[dào] 不[bù]明[míng]了[le] 不[bù]想[xiǎng]要[yào]
lyrics.EngStr: Don't know, don't understand, don't want

lyrics.ChnStr: 为什么我的心
lyrics.Pinyin: 为[wéi]什[shí]么[mó]我[wǒ]的[de]心[xīn]
lyrics.EngStr: Why does my heart

lyrics.ChnStr: 明明是想靠近 却孤单到黎明
lyrics.Pinyin: 明[míng]明[míng]是[shì]想[xiǎng]靠[kào]近[jìn] 却[què]孤[gū]单[dān]到[dào]黎[lí]明[míng]
lyrics.EngStr: Clearly wants to get close, yet stays lonely until dawn

lyrics.ChnStr: 不知道 不明了 不想要
lyrics.Pinyin: 不[bù]知[zhī]道[dào] 不[bù]明[míng]了[le] 不[bù]想[xiǎng]要[yào]
lyrics.EngStr: Don't know, don't understand, don't want

lyrics.ChnStr: 为什么我的心
lyrics.Pinyin: 为[wéi]什[shí]么[mó]我[wǒ]的[de]心[xīn]
lyrics.EngStr: Why does my heart

lyrics.ChnStr: 那爱情的绮丽 总是在孤单里
lyrics.Pinyin: 那[nà]爱[ài]情[qíng]的[de]绮[qǐ]丽[lì] 总[zǒng]是[shì]在[zài]孤[gū]单[dān]里[lǐ]
lyrics.EngStr: That beauty of love is always in loneliness

lyrics.ChnStr: 再把我的最好的爱给你
lyrics.Pinyin: 再[zài]把[bǎ]我[wǒ]的[de]最[zuì]好[hǎo]的[de]爱[ài]给[gěi]你[nǐ]
lyrics.EngStr: Give you my best love again

lyrics.ChnStr: 不知不觉 不情不愿 又到巷子口
lyrics.Pinyin: 不[bù]知[zhī]不[bù]觉[jué] 不[bù]情[qíng]不[bù]愿[yuàn] 又[yòu]到[dào]巷[xiàng]子[zǐ]口[kǒu]
lyrics.EngStr: Unconsciously, reluctantly, back at the alley entrance again

lyrics.ChnStr: 我没有哭 也没有笑 因为这是梦
lyrics.Pinyin: 我[wǒ]没[méi]有[yǒu]哭[kū] 也[yě]没[méi]有[yǒu]笑[xiào] 因[yīn]为[wéi]这[zhè]是[shì]梦[mèng]
lyrics.EngStr: I didn't cry, didn't laugh, because this is a dream

lyrics.ChnStr: 没有预兆 没有理由 你真的有说过
lyrics.Pinyin: 没[méi]有[yǒu]预[yù]兆[zhào] 没[méi]有[yǒu]理[lǐ]由[yóu] 你[nǐ]真[zhēn]的[de]有[yǒu]说[shuō]过[guò]
lyrics.EngStr: No warning, no reason, did you really say it

lyrics.ChnStr: 如果有 就让你自由
lyrics.Pinyin: 如[rú]果[guǒ]有[yǒu] 就[jiù]让[ràng]你[nǐ]自[zì]由[yóu]
lyrics.EngStr: If so, then let you be free
